title: Game Analysis

optionsToolbar.noArchiveStorage: You can only store up to 50 games in your Game Archive.

descriptions.version: The Chess engine that will be analysing your moves.
descriptions.depth: The number of moves that the engine looks ahead when analysing moves.
descriptions.lines: The number of variations that the engine will consider. Must be at least 2 for some classifications.
descriptions.timeLimit: The maximum amount of time the engine is allowed to analyse a single move.

suggestionArrows.disabled: Disabled: Do not show engine arrows
suggestionArrows.continuation: Top Continuation: Show an arrow for the top move in this position
suggestionArrows.alternative: Top Alternative: Show an arrow for the top move in the previous position

engine.title: Engine
engine.linesWarning: At least 2 lines are required for Critical and some Brilliant moves.

descriptions.simpleNotation: Show simple descriptions of Chess moves instead of standard notation. Example: Kxf4 -> King on e3 takes f4

gameSearchMenu.title: Select a game
gameSearchMenu.loadingLong: This is taking a while, please wait...
gameSearchMenu.userNotFound: We couldn't find an account with this username.
gameSearchMenu.noGamesFound: We couldn't find any games for this month.

analysisError: Analysis failed; your device or browser could be outdated.

progressReporter.evaluatingTooltip: If this takes a while, you can try lowering the engine depth in the settings.
progressReporter.captchaTooltip: This might take a few seconds...
progressReporter.captchaVerifyFailed: Could not verify the CAPTCHA; try refreshing the page.
progressReporter.captchaLoadFailed: Could not load the CAPTCHA. Your browser is likely outdated.
progressReporter.captchaUnknownError: Unknown CAPTCHA error; try refreshing the page.
progressReporter.reportFailed: Unknown error while generating the game report; try refreshing the page.

classifiedMoveCard.unknownError: A classification could not be loaded.
classifiedMoveCard.insufficientLines: Make sure the previous move is fully evaluated for a classification.
